data.title: North Carolina high school softball recruiting tracker
data.meta_description: A full list of high school softball players across the state of North Carolina in the Class of 2025 and 2026 that are committed to play collegiately.
data.text:
HighSchoolOT is compiling a full list of high school softball players from across the state of North Carolina who have committed to play at the next level.

If you have any additions, please report them to highschoolot@wral.com. See other sports by clicking here.

Note: Unless injured, a player must be playing for their high school team in order to be listed, or have been an all-state performer in the past. We will keep this list updated throughout the year.

Class of 2026

Division I

N/A

Division II

N/A

Division III

N/A
